00024 // ==================================================================== //
00025 //                                                                      //
00026 //     calcTotalProbability -- calculate total probability over all     //
00027 //                      ranks by taking the norm of the state vector.   //
00028 //                      Should be equal to one.                         // 
00029 //                                                                      //
00030 //     input:                                                           //
00031 //                    rank -- mpi proc id                               // 
00032 //                    numAmpsPerRank  -- number of amps on one rank     //
00033 //                    numRanks -- num mpi processes                     //
00034 //                    stateVecReal, -- real/imag parts of               //
00035 //                    stateVecImag     the state vector                 //
00036 //                                                                      //
00037 //     output:                                                          //
00038 //                    double -- total probability                       //
00039 //                                                                      //
00040 // ==================================================================== //
00041 
00042 
00043 double calcTotalProbability(MultiQubit multiQubit){
00044         double pTotal=0; 
00045         long long int index;
00046         long long int numAmpsPerRank = multiQubit.numAmps;
00047         for (index=0; index<numAmpsPerRank; index++){ 
00048                 pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index];      
00049                 pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index];      
00050         } 
00051         return pTotal;
00052 }
00053 
00054 // ==================================================================== 
00055 // rotateQubit: 
00056 // inputs:
00057 //      numAmpsPerRank -- number of amps in mpi proc
00058 //      numQubits -- number of qubits                     
00059 //      rotQubit -- qubit being rotated 
00060 //      aRe,    -- real/imag part of                
00061 //      aIm        rotation angle alpha             
00062 //      bRe,     -- real/imag part of                
00063 //      bIm         rotation angle beta              
00064 //
00065 // temp:
00066 //      stateVecRealPair, -- real/imag parts of the state vector offset by half a block
00067 //      stateVecImagPair     from the state vector updated on this rank, used to update
00068 //                           this rank's state vector
00069 //
00070 // outputs:
00071 //      stateVecReal, -- real/imag parts of               
00072 //      stateVecImag     the state vector updated on this rank                 
00073 // ==================================================================== 
00074 
00075 void rotateQubit(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int rotQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00076 
00077 {
00078         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00079         rotateQubitLocal(multiQubit, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00080 }
00081 
00082 // ==================================================================== 
00083 // findProbabilityOfZero: 
00084 // inputs:
00085 //      rank -- mpi proc id                              
00086 //      numAmpsPerRank -- number of amps in mpi proc
00087 //      numQubits -- number of qubits                     
00088 //      measureQubit -- qubit being measured
00089 //      stateVecReal, -- real/imag parts of               
00090 //      stateVecImag     the state vector updated on this rank                 
00091 // ==================================================================== 
00092 
00093 
00094 double findProbabilityOfZero(MultiQubit multiQubit,
00095                 const int measureQubit)
00096 {
00097         double stateProb=0;
00098         stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00099         return stateProb;
00100 }
